thread.section_title: PaintYourLife.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PaintYourLife.com | www.paintyourlife.com
thread.title: Jacob

author: Jacob
title: Jacob
text: I had the same picture painted twice by two different companies similar to PaintYourLife. Both were horrendous and I lost my money. I tried one more time with PaintYourLife, stating to myself that if the product is as bad that I will never again try this kind of service. I was surprised that I was allowed to chose the artist whom I wanted. I must say that the artist, Yolanda, did an incredible job; she delivered a museum quality portrait. I will definitely use your services again.
